body:
Hello , So ive been getting lots of lag on Avicus Nebula And everyone else is too i get 5654 fps on other server because i use alien ware or apple but on avicus i get 2112 fps because it lags so much and on FrostBite or Senex 2 where you get iron a block disappears then i fall into the void and i QQ ( if someone could fix this lag can you please do it or i might just leave avicus )
it gets annoying sometimes when i mine the Monument then i start to lag and someone kills me its just so annoying !

replies.body: Anything above 120fps on a 120hz monitor cannot be seen by human eyes. So since you are supposedly getting "2112 fps" that should not be a problem :)

replies.body:
fps and what you call "lag" are to different things(i think),
fps lag is dependent on your computer,
and "lag" is dependent on the connection between your computer and the server
replies.body_tagged:
fps and what you call "lag" are to different things(i think),
fps lag is dependent on your computer,
and "lag" is dependent on the connection between your computer and the server

replies.body:
I don't know if this is sarcasm. but there is no reason to make this post bragging about your frame rates. If you think 2000 is bad then you just get a better computer, I have alien ware and I have a NVIDIA graphics card and I get 2000 and I am very happy with it,.
.                


blocks disappearing is a natural thing in any server growing it is not only lag it includes anti-cheat which is currently getting developed to sustain a better reputation. if you are not liking getting the block glitch I recommend if you fast bridge to not and if you do stair bridging not to, do it slowly and shortly you will arrive where you were bridging,

Best regards, Cezbla


Try not to spam these kind of posts, Many people have posted this but I don't personally like how your showing off your aleinware some people die for food... but best regards.

replies.body: Well by default you cannot exceed 999 fps in Minecraft however if you get optifine and allow your fps to go higher, however only extremely fast computers can get 2500 - 3000 fps on Minecraft <u>with</u> optifine.
replies.body_tagged: Well by default you cannot exceed 999 fps in Minecraft however if you get optifine and allow your fps to go higher, however only extremely fast computers can get 2500 - 3000 fps on Minecraft <u>with</u> optifine.

replies.body: I only get 5-25 fps with 450+ ping ;( this isn't fair. Please don't complain about lag if you don't actually get any.
replies.body_tagged: I only get 5-25 fps with 450+ ping ;( this isn't fair. Please don't complain about lag if you don't actually get any.

replies.body:
You can.

Minecraft is more of a cpu consumer, unless you're using shaders.
And I wasn't talking about the 5000fps...
I was talking about the alienware, but it seems like you actually have one.
Alienwares are terribly overpriced.
I bought one for 1300$, huge mistake.

I'm building a pc at that price, and here are the differences.
Alienware:      Custom:
1tb hdd.     <.     1tb hdd, 256gb ssd
gtx 660.     <.     Gtx 770
i7 3770.     <.      i7 4790
win 8.         -      win 8
x51 case.   <.     Nzxt h440
8gb ram.    <.    8gb corsair ram, 1866mhz cl9
loud intel cooler < corsair h60 water cooler
unknown mobo < msi g45 z97

cost: $1350.       cost: $1300
